meanings.definition: A type of plastic laminate material used for countertops and other surfaces.
meanings.sent1: My kitchen countertop is made of formica.
meanings.sent2: The formica surface of the table is easy to clean.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled juice on the formica countertop, but it wiped off easily.
meanings.sent4: The formica material mimics the look of expensive marble.
meanings.sent5: The formica countertop sparkled under the kitchen lights.

meanings.definition: A genus of ants, including the common black ant.
meanings.sent1: The formica ants were marching in a straight line.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of formica ants carrying food back to their nest.
meanings.sent3: The formica ants seemed to be having a picnic in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The formica ants worked together to build their underground home.
meanings.sent5: The formica ants were busy exploring the forest floor.
